search_results.title: Mahmood Mamdani
search_results.snippet: Mahmood Mamdani FBA is a Ugandan academic, author, and political commentator. The Herbert Lehman Professor of Government and a professor of anthropology, ...

search_results.title: Mahmood Mamdani | Department of Anthropology
search_results.snippet: Mahmood Mamdani is the Herbert Lehman Professor of Government. He was also professor and executive director of Makerere Institute of Social Research.

search_results.title: Zohran K. Mamdani - Assembly District 36
search_results.snippet: Zohran Kwame Mamdani was born and raised in Kampala, Uganda, moving to New York City with his family at the age of 7.
